alert.note: Alert for Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 11:28PM EST until January 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. The strongest winds will be along the ridge tops and the western slopes. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany County. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Western Grant; Western Mineral; Western Pendleton
